medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain that radiates to her back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago with pain worsening with eating. Patient experienced a couple of episodes of nausea last week and one episode of vomiting, but none in several days. She has noted decreased appetite for 3 weeks with subjective weight loss.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease, benign hypertension, asthma, osteoarthritis, sarcoidosis, obesity.
